query:
SELECT 'courses' as type, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(status='published') as published FROM courses WHERE slug LIKE 'esl-%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'learning_paths', COUNT(*), SUM(status='published') FROM learning_paths WHERE slug LIKE 'esl-%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'modules', COUNT(*), SUM(status='published') FROM course_modules WHERE courseId BETWEEN 200001 AND 200006
UNION ALL
SELECT 'lessons', COUNT(*), SUM(status='published') FROM lessons WHERE courseId BETWEEN 200001 AND 200006
UNION ALL
SELECT 'activities', COUNT(*), SUM(status='published') FROM activities WHERE courseId BETWEEN 200001 AND 200006;
